program.name: conserver
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b,"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Ae -z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R"
ARGS="--with-pam" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ --with-logfile="${_localstatedir}/log" \ --with-pidfile="${_localstatedir}/run/conserver.pid" \ --with-cffile="${_sysconfdir}/conserver.cf" \ --with-pwdfile="${_sysconfdir}/conserver.passwd" \ --localstatedir="${_localstatedir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --with-openssl=${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL} \ --with-libwrap=${SB_VAR_TCPWRAP} \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.install:
gmake install
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_localstatedir}/run \ ${_sysconfdir} ${_docdir} ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null \ ${_sysconfdir}/conserver.cf ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 600 -o root -g 0 /dev/null \ ${_sysconfdir}/conserver.passwd ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 FAQ INSTALL README \ conserver/Sun-serial ${_docdir}

note.para: Because conserver has been compiled with SSL support, the PRNG daemon must be running to allow OpenSSL to obtain entropy (except for platforms with a /dev/random like Solaris 9 and Redhat Linux).
Conserver requires the following in the services file (or NIS services map). It will not start without this entry.
